title: Kabuki Brush By Simply Essentials. Today Only 50% off Angled for Maximum Coverage. One of the Best Large Long Handled Foundation Makeup Brushes You Can Purchase. Professional Quality, Very Soft, Very Natural Look Blender Brush and Very Dense Bristles. Great for Professional Make up Look. Use with Any Makeup Including Mac, Philosophy and Bare Minerals. Similiar to Sigma. Lifetime Guarantee. This Brush Covers Imperfections and Creates a Professional but Natural Look.
description:
The densely packed synthetic brush allows for moderate to full coverage of liquid, cream and powder foundation. The angled brush allows for easy application for the angles of the face.

Simply Essentials designed the angled kabuki brush for a flawless makeup application. The dense bristles make it easy to apply your liquid, cream or powder foundation. The long handle adds ease to your makeup application. The brush is also uniquely designed for stippling, contouring, covering imperfections and blending out your makeup. Create a luminous glow with the application of your make up! You will get an even application, natural looking coverage, every time. 

The synthetic fibers are ideal to be used with liquid, cream and powder products and can be easily cleaned. Vegan-friendly!

When you place your order, you can expect your brush to arrive quickly.

title: Moroccan Argan Oil and Australian Macadamia Oil Hair Treatment by ProArgan - Daily Hair Moisturizer - Light Weight Leave-in Treatment - Heat and Color Protectant - Promotes Natural Growth - Guaranteed to Transform Your Hair - 4.23oz/125mls

If you're not absolutely thrilled with how it transforms your hair, simply let us know and we'll give you 100% of your money back.
